caseTitle: M/s T & N Pakistan Private Limited, Faisalabad v. The Collector Customs, Model Customs Collectorate Customs House, Dry Port, Jhumra Road, Faisalabad, etc
tagline: (1) Claim of exemption of Custom Duty under FTA SRO 659 (1)/2007. (2) Section 18, 19 and 32 (2) & 156 of Customs Act. (3) Rule 14 of China-Pakistan Free Trade Area Rules of Origin, 2005. (4) Ambit of Reference Application under Section 196 of the Customs Act.
